targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  apy
FROM
  oeth_daily_stat
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
  and timestamp > '2023-05-29' -- Because prior APY values mess up the chart and are *** nonsense *** to look at. 
ORDER BY
  "timestamp" ASC

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  apy7_day_avg,
  apy14_day_avg,
  apy30_day_avg
FROM
  oeth_daily_stat
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
  and timestamp > '2023-05-29' -- Because prior APY values mess up the chart and are *** nonsense *** to look at. 
ORDER BY
  "timestamp" ASC

WITH _daily_strategy_balance as (
    select
        DATE(timestamp) as date,
        strategy,
        case
            when asset = '0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee' then '0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2'
            else asset end as asset,
        balance,
        ROW_NUMBER()
        OVER (PARTITION BY strategy, asset, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    from strategy_balance
    where asset in (
        select
            address
        from o_token_asset
        where symbol != 'OETH' AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
    )
),
     _daily_exchange_rate as (
    select
        DATE(timestamp) as date,
        base,
        quote,
        rate,
        ROW_NUMBER()
        OVER (PARTITION BY base, quote, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    from exchange_rate
),
     daily_strategy_balance as (
    select
        b.date,
        strategy,
        symbol,
        balance * (r.rate / 1e18) as balance,
        (r.rate / 1e18) as rate
    from _daily_strategy_balance b
    inner join o_token_asset oa
            on b.asset = oa.address AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
    left join _daily_exchange_rate r
            on r.date = b.date and r.base = 'ETH' and r.quote = oa.symbol and r.rn = 1
    where b.rn = 1
),
     daily_total as (
    select
        date,
        sum(balance) as total_balance
    from daily_strategy_balance
    group by date
),
     daily_strategy_asset_total as (
    select
        date,
        symbol,
        rate,
        sum(balance) as asset_balance
    from daily_strategy_balance
    group by date, symbol, rate
)

select
    t.date as time,
    -- t.total_balance,
    case when a.symbol = 'WETH' then 'ETH / WETH' else a.symbol end as symbol,
    -- a.asset_balance,
    a.asset_balance / nullif(t.total_balance, 0) as "%"
    -- a.rate
from daily_total t
inner join daily_strategy_asset_total a
        on t.date = a.date
where $__timeFilter(t.date) 
order by t.date asc

WITH _daily_strategy_balance as (
    select
        DATE(timestamp) as date,
        case
            when strategy = '0x1827f9ea98e0bf96550b2fc20f7233277fcd7e63' then 'AMO'
            when strategy = '0x3ff8654d633d4ea0fae24c52aec73b4a20d0d0e5' then 'Frax'
            when strategy = '0x49109629ac1deb03f2e9b2fe2ac4a623e0e7dfdc' then 'Aura'
            when strategy = '0xc1fc9e5ec3058921ea5025d703cbe31764756319' then 'Morpho Aave'
            when strategy = '0x39254033945aa2e4809cc2977e7087bee48bd7ab'
                and asset = '0xae78736cd615f374d3085123a210448e74fc6393' then 'Vault rETH'
            when strategy = '0x39254033945aa2e4809cc2977e7087bee48bd7ab'
                and asset = '0xae7ab96520de3a18e5e111b5eaab095312d7fe84' then 'Vault stETH'
            when strategy = '0x39254033945aa2e4809cc2977e7087bee48bd7ab'
                and asset = '0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2' then 'Vault WETH'
            else strategy
            end as strategy,
        asset,
        balance,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY strategy,
                asset,
                DATE(timestamp)
            ORDER BY
                timestamp DESC
            ) as rn
    from strategy_balance
    where asset in (
        select
            address
        from o_token_asset
        where symbol != 'OETH' AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
    )
),
     _daily_exchange_rate as (
    select
        DATE(timestamp) as date,
        base,
        quote,
        rate,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY base,
                quote,
                DATE(timestamp)
            ORDER BY
                timestamp DESC
            ) as rn
    from exchange_rate
),
     daily_strategy_balance as (
    select
        b.date,
        strategy,
        balance * coalesce(rate, 1e18) / 1e18 as balance
    from _daily_strategy_balance b
    inner join o_token_asset oa
            on b.asset = oa.address AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
    left join _daily_exchange_rate r
            on r.date = b.date and r.base = 'ETH' and r.quote = oa.symbol and r.rn = 1
    where b.rn = 1
),
     daily_total as (
    select
        date,
        sum(balance) as balance
    from daily_strategy_balance
    group by date
),
     daily_per_strategy_total as (
    select
        date,
        strategy,
        sum(balance) as strategy_balance
    from daily_strategy_balance
    group by date,
             strategy
)
select
    t.date as time,
    a.strategy,
    a.strategy_balance / nullif(t.balance, 0) as "%"
from daily_total t
inner join daily_per_strategy_total a
        on t.date = a.date
where $__timeFilter(t.date)
order by t.date asc

WITH _daily_strategy_balance as (
    select
        DATE(timestamp) as date,
        strategy,
        case
            when asset = '0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee' then '0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2'
            else asset end as asset,
        balance,
        ROW_NUMBER()
        OVER (PARTITION BY strategy, asset, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    from strategy_balance
    where asset in (
        select
            address
        from o_token_asset
        where symbol != 'OETH' AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
    )
),
     _daily_exchange_rate as (
    select
        DATE(timestamp) as date,
        base,
        quote,
        rate,
        ROW_NUMBER()
        OVER (PARTITION BY base, quote, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    from exchange_rate
),
     daily_strategy_balance as (
    select
        b.date,
        strategy,
        symbol,
        balance * (r.rate / 1e18) as balance,
        (r.rate / 1e18) as rate
    from _daily_strategy_balance b
    inner join o_token_asset oa
            on b.asset = oa.address AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
    left join _daily_exchange_rate r
            on r.date = b.date and r.base = 'ETH' and r.quote = oa.symbol and r.rn = 1
    where b.rn = 1
),
     daily_total as (
    select
        date,
        sum(balance) as total_balance
    from daily_strategy_balance
    group by date
),
     daily_strategy_asset_total as (
    select
        date,
        symbol,
        rate,
        sum(balance) as asset_balance
    from daily_strategy_balance
    group by date, symbol, rate
)

select
    t.date as time,
    -- t.total_balance,
    case when a.symbol = 'WETH' then 'ETH / WETH' else a.symbol end as symbol,
    -- a.asset_balance,
    a.asset_balance / nullif(t.total_balance, 0) as "%"
    -- a.rate
from daily_total t
inner join daily_strategy_asset_total a
        on t.date = a.date
where t.date = current_date
order by t.date asc

WITH _daily_strategy_balance as (
    select
        DATE(timestamp) as date,
        strategy,
        case
            when asset = '0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee' then '0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2'
            else asset end as asset,
        balance,
        ROW_NUMBER()
        OVER (PARTITION BY strategy, asset, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    from strategy_balance
    where asset in (
        select
            address
        from o_token_asset
        where symbol != 'OETH' AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
    )
),
     _daily_exchange_rate as (
    select
        DATE(timestamp) as date,
        base,
        quote,
        rate,
        ROW_NUMBER()
        OVER (PARTITION BY base, quote, DATE(timestamp) ORDER BY timestamp DESC) as rn
    from exchange_rate
),
     daily_strategy_balance as (
    select
        b.date,
        strategy,
        symbol,
        balance,
        balance * coalesce(r.rate / 1e18, 1) as balance_eth,
        balance * coalesce(r.rate / 1e18, 1) * coalesce(r_usd.rate / 1e8, 1) as balance_usd,
        coalesce(r.rate / 1e18, 1) as rate,
        coalesce(r_usd.rate / 1e18, 1) as rate_usd
    from _daily_strategy_balance b
    inner join o_token_asset oa
            on b.asset = oa.address AND chain_id = 1 AND otoken = '0x856c4efb76c1d1ae02e20ceb03a2a6a08b0b8dc3'
    left join _daily_exchange_rate r
            on r.date = b.date and r.base = 'ETH' and r.quote = oa.symbol and r.rn = 1
    left join _daily_exchange_rate r_usd
            on r_usd.date = b.date and r_usd.base = 'ETH' and r_usd.quote = 'USD' and r_usd.rn = 1
    where b.rn = 1
),
     daily_strategy_asset_total as (
    select
        date,
        symbol,
        rate,
        sum(balance) as balance,
        sum(balance_eth) as balance_eth,
        sum(balance_usd) as balance_usd
    from daily_strategy_balance
    group by date, symbol, rate
)

select
    symbol,
    balance / 1e18 as balance,
    balance_eth / 1e18 as balance_eth,
    balance_usd / 1e18 as balance_usd
from daily_strategy_asset_total
where date = current_date
order by date

SELECT timestamp as time, earnings_change / 1000000000000000000 as earnings_change, balance / 1000000000000000000 as balance
FROM strategy_daily_yield
WHERE strategy = '0x1827f9ea98e0bf96550b2fc20f7233277fcd7e63'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  -- earnings / 1000000000000000000 as earnings,
  apy,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy7,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 13 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy14,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 29 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy30
FROM
  strategy_daily_yield 
  where strategy = '0x1827f9ea98e0bf96550b2fc20f7233277fcd7e63'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

ORDER BY timestamp

panels.title: OETH Convex ETH+OETH (AMO) - APY by Day

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  "timestamp" as time,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING) AS previous,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy7,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 13 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy14,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 29 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy30
FROM strategy_daily_yield
where strategy = '0x1827f9ea98e0bf96550b2fc20f7233277fcd7e63'
ORDER by timestamp desc
LIMIT 1

SELECT timestamp as time, 1-balance_weight as percentage_oeth
FROM strategy_daily_yield
WHERE strategy = '0x1827f9ea98e0bf96550b2fc20f7233277fcd7e63'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

WITH base as (
SELECT 
  timestamp as time, 
  balance0 / 1e18 as balance0, 
  balance1 / 1e18 as balance1, 
  ((balance0 / 1e18) + (balance1 / 1e18)) as total
FROM curve_pool_balance
where address = '0x94b17476a93b3262d87b9a326965d1e91f9c13e7'
order by time
)

select 
  time,
  balance0,
  balance1,
  balance0 / nullif(total, 0) as balance0_p,
  balance1 / nullif(total, 0) as balance1_p
from base

select
  timestamp as time,
  rate / 1e18 as rate
from
  curve_pool_rate
where
  address = '0x94b17476a93b3262d87b9a326965d1e91f9c13e7'
  and name = '1-0-1000000000000000000'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  and timestamp > '2023-05-01' -- omit some initial funky values
order by
  time asc

select
  timestamp as time,
  rate / 1e18 as rate
from
  curve_pool_rate
where
  address = '0x94b17476a93b3262d87b9a326965d1e91f9c13e7'
  and name = '1-0-1000000000000000000'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
  and timestamp > '2023-05-01' -- omit some initial funky values
order by
  time asc

SELECT timestamp as time, earnings_change / 1000000000000000000 as earnings_change, balance / 1000000000000000000 as balance
FROM strategy_daily_yield
where strategy = '0x3ff8654d633d4ea0fae24c52aec73b4a20d0d0e5'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
order by time

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  -- earnings / 1000000000000000000 as earnings,
  apy,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy7,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 13 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy14,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 29 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy30
FROM
  strategy_daily_yield 
  where strategy = '0x3ff8654d633d4ea0fae24c52aec73b4a20d0d0e5'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

ORDER BY timestamp

  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy7,

SELECT timestamp as time, earnings_change / 1000000000000000000 as earnings_change, balance / 1000000000000000000 as balance
FROM strategy_daily_yield
WHERE strategy = '0x39254033945aa2e4809cc2977e7087bee48bd7ab' and asset = '0xae78736cd615f374d3085123a210448e74fc6393'
  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)

ORDER BY timestamp

panels.description: These values are based on the ETH/rETH exchange rate which is why we see APY values that are quite variable.

  "timestamp" AS "time",
  -- earnings / 1000000000000000000 as earnings,
  apy,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy7,

  and $__timeFilter(timestamp)
ORDER BY timestamp

ORDER by timestamp desc

panels.title: OETH Aura rETH/WETH - APY by Day

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  "timestamp" as time,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 PRECEDING) AS previous,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy7,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 13 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy14,
  AVG(apy) OVER(ORDER BY timestamp ROWS BETWEEN 29 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS apy30
FROM strategy_daily_yield
where strategy = '0x49109629ac1deb03f2e9b2fe2ac4a623e0e7dfdc'
ORDER by timestamp desc
LIMIT 1

WITH totals as (
  select
    DATE(daily_stat_id_id) as time,
    sum(tvl / 1e18) as tvl
  from
    oeth_strategy_daily_stat
  group by
    DATE(daily_stat_id_id)
  order by
    DATE(daily_stat_id_id) asc
),
mix as (
  select
    DATE(daily_stat_id_id) as time,
    name,
    tvl / 1e18 as tvl,
    (
      select
        tvl
      from
        totals
      where
        time = DATE(daily_stat_id_id)
    ) as total
  from
    oeth_strategy_daily_stat sds
  order by
    DATE(daily_stat_id_id) asc
)
select
  time,
  lower(name) as name,
  -- tvl,
  -- total,
  tvl / total as "%"
from
  mix
where $__timeFilter(time) 
order by
  time
